channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Protruding man hole covers, 10th November
item.description:
There are two man holes cover that are severely raised and causing cars to swerve around , the road could possibly need resurfacing
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 32, Broad Oaks Way, Park Langley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Winn's Common being neglected, 10th November
item.description:
Litter everywhere, bins overflowing, fireworks everywhere and nothing being done about it for weeks! Also flytipped items including a large electric fan and a bed base(been here more than a month.) Why are you allowing people to use the common to let off fireworks, it's illegal and dangerous.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Winn Common Road, Plumstead, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Illegally parked vehicle, 10th November
item.description:
This vehicle is parked on the pavement blocking access for wheelchairs and prams. It also is blocking the path for the communal bins that get emptied once a week. It was dropped of by a private waste collection company this morning . And has been there all day.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Flintmill Crescent, Well Hall, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Building extensions for religious study, 10th November
item.description:
This extensions are gathering more and more students and they make big noise outside of the noise aloud hours. This also makes the area busier with traffic and intimidation to the community. Some religious students had been harassment to the LGBTQ communit

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Cazenove Road, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown leaves and branches on tree base. Need to be cut back or trimmed, 10th November
item.description:
There are overgrown leaves at the base of a tree located on the pavement outside houses and near a newsagent's shop. The pavement is very narrow to pass, making the pavement walkway impassable due to prickly branches. Require to be cut back please.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 285, Crystal Palace Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Dumped black bags containing dog faeces, 10th November
item.description:
Not a new problem but fly-tipping of dog waste seems to be accumulating on a regular basis dumped on verge. From a dog walking business or kennels?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Woodlands Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Slippery leaves on the pavements, 10th November
item.description:
Between Lafone Street and Horselydown Lane and on Lafone Street between Gainsford Street and QE Street. Lots of fallen leaves, now very wet and slippery and a falling hazard.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 19, Lafone Street, Bermondsey, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Nw3 1az, 10th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 4, Vale of Health, West Hampstead, London

item.title: Abandoned metal cart, 10th November
item.description:
This cart has been sitting in the street for weeks, if not longer. It is propped up against the electric car charger.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Copper Row, Bermondsey, London

item.title: Refuse bins left in residents parking bay, 10th November
item.description:
Building materials left on pavement and now refuse bins left in residents parking bay outside no 13 Dale Road. Making parking even more difficult to find a space especially if you are paying for a parking permit.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dale Road, Crayford, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overgrown leaves on tree at the base. Blocking access around pavement for pedestrians., 10th November
item.description:
Large tree overgrowing from base with many leaves blocking the pavement and footpath, located by the Goodrich Road / Barry Road zebra crossing. It needs to be cut right back to allow pedestrians access to walk past. It can also cause a trip hazard as the roots are raised from the pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 204, Barry Road, East Dulwich, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amount of leaves on the pavement of Upper Park Road, between the junctions of Regent Square and Halt Robin Road Belvedere DA17., 10th November
item.description:
A large quantity of fallen leaves are on the pavement of Upper Park Road, Belvedere DA17, between the junctions of Regent Square and Halt Robin Road. As these leaves have become wet, there is a risk of slipping, especially the elderly. Would arrangements be put in place to remove/collect the leaves as soon as practical.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Upper Park Road, Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Whole Lyndhurst Road needs sweeping, 10th November
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lyndhurst Road, Barnehurst, London
